call_title: The Next 5 Years of Ergo | Alex Chepurnoy | Ergoversary Summit 2024

topics.title: Introduction and Talk Structure Overview
topics.summary: Alex Chepurnoy introduces his personal reflections on Ergo's future and outlines the three-part structure covering history, current state, and future plans. He emphasizes these are his personal thoughts on core protocol and ecosystem development.

topics.title: Ergo Launch History and Early Development
topics.summary: Covers Ergo's painful launch on July 1st 2019 during crypto winter and the establishment of Ergo Foundation. Describes the first crowdfunding using node hackery and early smart contract developments including zero-join paper and multi-stage contracts.

topics.title: 2020-2021 Application Ecosystem Growth
topics.summary: Details the emergence of first end-user applications including ErgoMixer, Oracle Pools, Zero-Knowledge Treasury, auction house, and SigmaUSD. Highlights 2021 as the beginning of DeFi with Spectrum DEX launch.

topics.title: 2022-2024 DeFi Expansion and Cross-Chain
topics.summary: Chronicles solid DeFi growth with tools like Ergo Raffle, SigmaFi lending, and DuckPools. Emphasizes 2024 as the year of cross-chain connectivity with Rosen Bridge launches for Cardano, Bitcoin, and upcoming Ethereum support.

topics.title: Core Protocol Upgrades History
topics.summary: Reviews major protocol upgrades including hardening hard fork, EIP-27 soft fork, unplanned EIP-37 hard fork, and Sigma 5.0 soft fork. Notes the progression from hard forks to soft forks requiring only miner updates.

topics.title: Governance Organizations Development
topics.summary: Outlines the establishment of three key governance organizations: Ergo Foundation (2019), Sigmanauts DAO (2022), and the recently formed ErgoDevs DAO. Shows the evolution toward decentralized governance structures.

topics.title: Current Stablecoin Ecosystem Status
topics.summary: Details current stablecoin landscape with SigmaUSD operational, Dexy launching, and Gluon preparing for mainnet. Discusses future trusted stablecoins via bridges and the need for modified tooling like stable pools.

topics.title: DEX Variety and Trading Options
topics.summary: Showcases diverse DEX ecosystem including Spectrum DEX with multiple UIs, new TradingHouse peer-to-peer order book, CrystalPool from ErgoHack, and TeleFract for self-sovereign grid trading. Demonstrates innovation in decentralized trading.

topics.title: Complete DeFi and Application Ecosystem
topics.summary: Comprehensive overview of current ecosystem including lending (SigmaFi, DuckPools), games/NFTs (Blitz TCG, Cyberverse), derivatives (SigmaO), monetary experiments (auction/HODL coins), DAO tools (Paideia), and real-world applications like Xlair for Kenyan farmers.

topics.title: Sigma 6.0 Protocol Development
topics.summary: Introduces Sigma 6.0 development with fixes and new features in contraction layer enabling more efficient rollups, trustless hash rate derivatives, and Bitcoin relay contracts. Focuses on expanding protocol capabilities for Layer 2 solutions.

topics.title: Performance and Storage Rent Improvements
topics.summary: Discusses need for fast confirmations and throughput improvements using sub-blocks or micro blocks. Addresses growing importance of storage rent and potential tweaking, mentioning EIP-45 for storage rent redistribution.

topics.title: Real World Money and ChainCash
topics.summary: Presents vision for real-world money with elastic supply using stable units like gold. Introduces ChainCash concept for creating collateral-backed money where payment acceptance depends on collateral quality and trust between parties.

topics.title: Sidechains and Trustless Relays
topics.summary: Outlines sidechain development progress from ErgoHack 7 designs and ErgoHack 8 trustless relays. Plans to publish explanations and continue research while seeking interested parties for launches.

topics.title: Mining Decentralization and Lithos Launch
topics.summary: Emphasizes need for mining decentralization with Lithos mainnet planned for November-December 2024. Discusses storage rent creating interesting mining dynamics and hopes for fair initial mining offerings revival as better alternative to airdrops.

topics.title: Cross-Chain Expansion Plans
topics.summary: Details cross-chain roadmap including Bitcoin runes support, EVM chains post-Ethereum bridge, Bitcoin Cash, Nervos, and other UTXO Alliance blockchains. Mentions advanced protocols like RGB++ using isomorphic binding.

topics.title: Developer Tooling Improvements
topics.summary: Outlines developer experience improvements including costing support in Sigma 6.0, better error reporting and debugging tools. Considers support for high-level languages like ErgoLisp and return to formal verification with real-world experience.

topics.title: Governance and Protocol Development Rules
topics.summary: Envisions additional governance entities like Ergo Association or Ecosystem Fund for ecosystem-wide coordination. Calls for defining release rules, security protocols, and research-driven development standards for core protocol implementation.

topics.title: Five Year Vision Summary
topics.summary: Concludes with vision of Ergo as hyperconnected blockchain with rich sidechain ecosystem, safest DeFi, real-world value tools with elastic supply, built by decentralized community following research-driven approach. Emphasizes trustless peer-to-peer interactions and proof-of-work foundation.
